channel.title: Chicago R Unconference
channel.description: Recent content on Chicago R Unconference

item.description: Chicago R Conference Code of Conduct The organizers of the Chicago R Unconference are committed to providing a welcoming and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or technology choices. We do not tolerate harassment of conference participants in any form. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for any conference venue, including talks, workshops, parties, Twitter and other online media.
